span.font: Please enjoy the following video on what makes Godfrey-Lee special, and why it matters to our parents, students, staff, and community. It's just 5 minutes long, with Spanish subtitles. Special thanks to WKTV and Carlos Sanchez for bringing this video to life!

font.span:
Kevin Polston, Andy Steketee, Pete Geerling, and Kyle Mayer, from the Reading Now Network Leadership Team, joined Shelley Irwin on WGVU's School Talk program to share how Godfrey-Lee Public School's partnership with
​Reading Now Network is impacting literacy instruction.
